page.title: 11St.James' Sutton
page.content: The parish church of St. James Sutton can be seen with its spire from all around the area.It is 145 years old being built in 1840.The organ is 84 years old and the organist is Mr.J.Campbell Kelly.There are 8 bell ringers who practise on Wednesday evenings.There are graves dating back 155years outside and the parish has 3000 people in its area. In 1984 there were 14 weddings,44 funerals and 20 christenings.Usually each Sunday the vicar Rev.C.F.Eastwood takes services at 8.30(Holy Communion),10.30(Family service)and evensong at 6.30.Every Sunday at 10.30 there is a Sunday School.There are many activities based at the church like Beavers,cubs,scouts,guides,venture rangers mother's union, youth club and The Followers.
